quotes.quote: Be the change you wish to see in the world.
The only true wisdom is in knowing you know nothing.
I have not failed. I've just found 10,000 ways that won't work.
Even the word hopeless is not void of hope.
Happiness can be found even in the darkest of times if only one remembers to turn on the light.
Courage is not the absence of fear, but rather the judgement that something else is more important than fear.
If you look for the light, you can often find it. But if you look for the dark, that is all you will ever see.
Nothing is IMPOSSIBLE. The word itself says 'I'M POSSIBLE'!

Nobody in need of forgiveness deserves it. Not one person. We all make foolish mistakes that we cannot fix. Though we may not deserve forgiveness, we all have a right to it. Just for having the courage to live in this difficult world, where fallible people do imperfect things. The supply of forgiveness is unlimited.
We did not come this far to only come this far.
